name: One Ability Squad
description:
Use one member of the One Ability Squad to stop the evil villain and save the day!
Unlock additional heroes by completing secret in-game objectives.
Preform awesome acts of heroism such as saving hostages, shooting lasers, and drowning in acid!

WASD or Arrow keys to move and jump.
Space bar to activate your one ability.
Q to quit to main menu
R to reset the level

This game was originally designed for Bored Pixels Jam 7, with the two themes 'Pixilated' and 'One Ability'
It was not completed in time, submitted or published.
This game was submitted to the Second Chances Game Jam. One Large change I made for this submission was to switch the game engine from Phaser to Godot. This change made a world of difference.
